item.title: Frame246 question
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Just for the point of messing around, im trying to make a command that makes a huge 3d version of your equipted weapon appear in a skill menu. Here is my command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("blowup")) { sendFrame246(8715, 900, playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); }

When I type ::blowup, nothing happens.

(The real reason Im trying to make this command is to understand how the frame246 works and how to manipulate it; so if my above command isen’t even close to what it should be, go easy, im learning.)

Read full topic
